string.name: terms
string.p: By creating a RentalGeek account, you agree to our Terms & Conditions

resources.string: Pay and get your Geek Score™
Fill out our form once and apply to as many properties as you want

string.name: armed
string.p: Armed with your GeekScore™, apply to any property with a single click and your completed app is instantly sent for speedy approval. Simply "Click-to-Rent" and you are done.

resources.string: Check out the freshest digs, available now, right from your phone using our patent pending augmented reality technology.
Just update it every time you rent, and never touch paper tenant forms again
For a single one-time payment of $25, apply to as many rentals as you want so you never miss out on your second choice rental while waiting to hear back from your first.
Your personal information is always sent over a secure connection and encrypted on our server. It is never stored in your device.
This process is quick and secure. Your personal information is required in order for us to retrieve your credit report and verify your identity.

The Fair Credit Reporting Act allows me to obtain a disclosure from every credit reporting agency of the nature and substance of all information in my ﬁle at the time of the request. Full disclosure of information in your ﬁle can be obtained at RentalGeek.com in your user proﬁle. The credit report you are requesting from RentalGeek is not intended to consititute the disclosure of RentalGeek information required by the Fair Credit Reporting Act or similar State Laws.
 
 I am entitled to receive a disclosure directly from the consumer reporting agency free of charge under the following circumstances:

 I have been denied credit, insurance or employment within the past sixty (60) days as a result of my credit report

 I certify in writing that I am unemployed and intend to apply for employment in the 60-day period beginning on the date on which i made the certification

 I am a recipient of public Welfare assistance

You understand that by clicking on the I AGREE button immediately following this notice you are providing ‘written instructions’ to RentalGeek under the Fair Credit Reporting Act authorizing RentalGeek to obtain information from your personal credit profile or other information from a credit reporting agency. You authorize RentalGeek to obtain such information to verift your identity.\n\n
If you agree to share a Credit Report, we will also use this information to share accompanying criminal and eviction history.
Enter your RentalGeek password to encrypt your information. If you don’t remember your password, you will have to recreate your GeekScore™ Profile again.

You understand that by clicking on the \'Agree and Pay $25.00\' button immediately following this notice, you are providing \'written instruction\' to RentalGeek under the Fair Credit Reporting Act to obtain information from your personal credit profile or other information from a credit reporting agency. You authorize RentalGeek to obtain information to create your GeekScore.™

You have successfully completed the GeekScore™ Application Process \n\n Take advantage of GeekVision™ and choose from a wide selection of rental properties available only at RentalGeek. You can apply for the property of your choice from the property detail page.
You have been invited by %1s to join a roommate group.
You must create your GeekScore™ to apply
%s has invited\n you to be a cosigner!
To continue please fill out\nour cosigner application
This process is quick and secure.Your personal information is required in order for us to retrieve your credit report and verify your identity.
